alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 26 at 8:58PM CST until February 27 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 44 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 AM CST MONDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 28 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OKLAHOMA CANADIAN CLEVELAND GRADY KINGFISHER LINCOLN LOGAN MCCLAIN OKLAHOMA PAYNE POTTAWATOMIE IN EAST CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PONTOTOC SEMINOLE IN NORTHERN OKLAHOMA GARFIELD GRANT KAY NOBLE IN SOUTHEAST OKLAHOMA ATOKA BRYAN COAL HUGHES JOHNSTON MARSHALL IN SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA CARTER GARVIN JEFFERSON LOVE MURRAY STEPHENS IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN TEXAS ARCHER CLAY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, ARCHER CITY, ARDMORE, ATOKA, BLACKWELL, BLANCHARD, CHANDLER, CHICKASHA, COALGATE, CONCHO, DAVENPORT, DAVIS, DUNCAN, DURANT, EL RENO, ENID, GUTHRIE, HENNESSEY, HENRIETTA, HOLDENVILLE, HOLLIDAY, KINGFISHER, KINGSTON, LAKESIDE CITY, LAMONT, LINDSAY, MADILL, MARIETTA, MEDFORD, MEEKER, MOORE, MUSTANG, NEWCASTLE, NORMAN, OKARCHE, OKLAHOMA CITY, PAULS VALLEY, PERRY, PONCA CITY, POND CREEK, PRAGUE, PURCELL, RINGLING, RYAN, SCOTLAND, SEMINOLE, SHAWNEE, STILLWATER, STROUD, SULPHUR, THACKERVILLE, TISHOMINGO, TUTTLE, WAKITA, WAURIKA, WELLSTON, WETUMKA, WEWOKA, WYNNEWOOD, AND YUKON.
